description: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Multi-format HTML5 Document Viewer is the next-generation multi-format document-viewing technology for .NET developers. The DocumentViewer control supports viewing, form-filling, text searching (with OCR support) and printing PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. It works on both desktop(Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Linux, Mac OS X) and mobile browsers (IOS, Android, Windows Phone).
releaseNotes:
Version 2017 R1 - January 4, 2017
==================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Demos
    * Added a full-featured demo using ASP.NET WebForms in VB
    * Added a full-featured demo using ASP.NET MVC in VB
  - Features
    * Optimized user interface behaviour in mobile devices
    * Client-side features:
      + New properties to configure Navigation Pane under “Preferences”:
         - Preferences.NavigationPane.visible
         - Preferences.NavigationPane.position
         - Preferences.NavigationPane.width
         - Preferences.NavigationPane.Bookmarks.enabled
         - Preferences.NavigationPane.Thumbnails.enabled
+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
   - Formal release of Spreadsheet formats Support for 
     * XLSX
     * XLS
     * ODS
   - Spreadsheets supported features includes
     * Content
        + Header
	      - First Header
          - Even Header
          - Odd / Default Header
        + Footer
          - First Footer
          - Even Footer
          - Odd / Default Footer
        + Heading
          - Row Heading
          - Column Heading
	    + Boolean value
        + Text alignment based on its type
        + Cell Formats
     * Formatting
        + Row Styles
          - Alignment
          - Borders
          - Fills
        + Hidden items
          - Row Hide
          - Column Hide
Fixed
~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Toolbar layouting issue in mobile device
  - Text search issue in IE
  - Form-filling issue on Safari (Mac) where entered text was invisible
  - PDF form-filling issue where the unchecked state of checkboxes was not being saved
  - Issue in PDF form filling where text copied using the mouse (right-click -> paste) into a multi-line field was being ignored
  - Issue in PDF form filling where duplicate (fields having same name) multi-line fields were not being handled correctly

+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
  - XLSX
     * Image parsing issue in XLSX where the image stream and scaling factors were not parsed.
     * Layouting issue when there are long lines in a cell with wrap text value set to false.
     * Layouting issue when there are Long lines in a cell with cells merged.
     * Vertical alignment issue with Rich text.
     * Issue with rendering font style information. 
     * Issue with rendering boolean type and its default properties like alignment.
     * Issue with Background color rendering where tint percentage was not considered. 
     * Issue with font color rendering where tint percentage was not considered. 
  - XLS
     * Issue with Rendering Row style information
     * Issue with formula rendering when there was string type formula and error type formula.
     * Issue with font information rendering 
  - ODS
     * Issue with Rendering Row style information
     * Issue with parsing images
  - PDF	
     * Desktop printer produces low quality output.
     * GetAllAnnotations() does not return annotations added in the current instance.
summary: TypeScript Definitions (d.ts) Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET HTML5 Document Viewer
title: Gnostice.Web.TypeScript.Declarations
